hero.title: Welcome to Khadamat
hero.subtitle: Your all-in-one platform to find and offer quality services.

description.general: Discover a wide range of general services that cater to all your everyday needs.
description.plumber: Get plumbing services from professional plumbers to fix your issues quickly and efficiently.
description.electrician: Rely on experienced electricians to repair and maintain your electrical systems at home or work.
description.cleaning: Enjoy comprehensive cleaning services to keep your home or office spotless with top quality.
description.tutoring: Receive personalized tutoring in various subjects from experienced teachers.
description.handyman: Count on skilled handymen to handle various maintenance and repair tasks around your home.
description.gardening: Enjoy specialized gardening services to enhance the beauty of your garden and home.

become_tasker_page.title: Become a Service Provider
become_tasker_page.description: Join our platform as a service provider and start offering your skills to clients worldwide.
become_tasker_page.sidebar_description: Join our community of taskers and grow your business.

forgot_password_page.title: Password Recovery

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.description: Getting your tasks done in Morocco has never been easier. Follow these three simple steps to start.

1.title: Search for services or offer your skills
1.description: Whether you're looking for a plumber, an electrician, or a tutor, our platform connects you with the right professionals. If you have skills to offer, create your profile and start attracting clients.

2.title: Connect with clients or workers
2.description: Communicate directly with clients or service providers through our secure messaging system. Discuss your needs, negotiate prices, and schedule appointments with ease.

3.title: Enjoy quality services or grow your business
3.description: Experience top-notch services delivered by trusted professionals. If you're a service provider, build your reputation and grow your business by delivering excellent service to your clients.

services_section.title: Premium Services
services_section.description: Exceptional quality and verified professionals for your every need across Morocco.

categories.plumbing_description: Expert leak repairs, pipe installations, and bathroom maintenance by certified professionals.
categories.cleaning_description: Professional deep cleaning for homes and offices. Flexible scheduling to fit your life.
categories.handyman_description: Versatile experts for furniture assembly, mounting, and general home improvements.
categories.gardening_description: Complete lawn care, landscaping, and outdoor maintenance to keep your garden beautiful.

hero.title: About Khadamat
hero.subtitle: The trusted gateway connecting local talent to everyday needs in Morocco.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: At Khadamat, we believe that finding a qualified professional shouldn't be an uphill battle. Whether you need an electrician in Fes, a plomber, or a cleaning service, our platform simplifies the connection.
mission.p2: We are digitalizing the service sector in Morocco by offering providers a professional showcase to grow their business, and customers a secure and fast solution.

trust.title: Trust & Security
trust.description: All our providers are verified to ensure quality and secure service.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Book a service in just a few clicks and get an instant response.

proximity.title: Proximity
proximity.description: Find the best experts right next to you, anywhere in Morocco.

cta.title: Ready to simplify your daily life?

brand.name: Khadamat
brand.description: Connecting skilled professionals with people who need to get things done. Quality service, guaranteed.
